data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Parotocinclus (Siluriformes, Hypoptopomatinae) from the rio Tapajos basin

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roxo, Fabio F., Silva, Gabriel S. C., Oliveira, Claudio (2016): Description of a new species of Parotocinclus (Siluriformes, Hypoptopomatinae) from the rio Tapajos basin. ZooKeys 634: 125-136, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.634.9917, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.634.9917
